Title: Relates to actions and proceedings seeking an abatement of rent based on violations of the housing maintenance code
Summary: Relates to actions and proceedings seeking an abatement of rent based on violations of the housing maintenance code, applicable housing standards, the building code, or the health code.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd ยง110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to actions and proceedings seeking an abatement of rent based on violations of the housing maintenance code or the warranty of habitability
